channel.title: Anselmo L. S. Melo's Git Achievements

item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 3)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Archivist (Level 6)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 9)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Fisherman (Level 6)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Hunter (Level 7)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 2)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 1)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 11)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Investigator (Level 7)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Investigator (Level 6)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 1)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Fisherman (Level 5)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Architect (Level 7)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Apprentice Carpenter (Level 2)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Fisherman (Level 4)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 10)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Master Pilgrim (Level 7)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Merchant (Level 8)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level 8)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Master Author (Level 12)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.
